alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:16AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bourbon and northern Crawford Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1216 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hepler, or 17 miles west of Fort Scott, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Scott... Marmaton... Arcadia... Uniontown... Redfield... Hepler... Hiattville... Petersburg... Farlington... Garland... Porterville... Pawnee Station... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
